law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 19. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 16. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3897-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Dispensing with administration of small estates.
